Name: Goddess of Hentai
About the game: Goddess of Hentai is a mature puzzle game with variety of features: • 10 characters in 4K resolution, each with 4 variations • two difficulty modes: easy: move the puzzles freely hard: switch only adjacent pieces • girls have their own personalised music, overall 10 tracks • 5 main menu melodies to choose from • gallery mode • selection page for picking specific levels • Steam Achievements & Steam Cloud To unlock 100 achievements you need to undress all goddesses on easy and hard mode.
